channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Server Message Block
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Server Message Block

item.title: CVE-2018-0833|2024-08-05T03:35:49.457Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- server%20message%20block
item.description: The Microsoft Server Message Block 2.0 and 3.0 (SMBv2/SMBv3) client in Windows 8.1 and RT 8.1 and Windows Server 2012 R2 allows a denial of service vulnerability due to how specially crafted requests are handled, aka "SMBv2/SMBv3 Null Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability".
